title: Personal Profile Web Application
description: Responsive multi-page personal website featuring user authentication, blog posting, contact form, and fare calculator.
details: Utilized HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to build interactive UI components with localStorage for Client-side data persistence.
Implemented dynamic content rendering and CRUD operations across blog and contact modules.

title: Self-Hosted Cloud Infrastructure
description: Deployed and managed multiple virtual machines on a personal cloud server using Linux.
details: Configured dedicated networking and domain routing (Kotu.ca) for persistent workspaces and remote server hosting.

title: Electricity Billing Program
description: Desktop application in Java using Javax Swing GUI to monitor and calculate electricity usage and billing for multiple users.
details: Integrated CSV-based data storage for efficient tracking & management of billing records.
Applied principles of Abstraction, Polymorphism, Inheritance, Encapsulation and clean object-oriented architecture.
Leveraged modular JavaScript design patterns for frontend logic and user interaction.
